CONCLUSION: Violation of Art. 6-1;Pecuniary damage - claim dismissed;Non-pecuniary damage - financial award
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in the village of GPE , the GPE region of GPE .
CARDINAL . The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .
CARDINAL . In DATE the applicant instituted proceedings in the GPE City Court of GPE against the “ ORG - a ORG - owned enterprise - to recover unpaid salary for DATE .

CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG found in favour of the applicant ( рішення PERSON міського суду PERSON області ) and awarded him UAH CARDINAL,CARDINAL.CARDINAL in salary arrears and compensation for devaluation . The decision became effective on DATE and was sent for execution to ORG ( ORG виконавчої служби PERSON міського управління юстиції ) . However , the decision was not executed , allegedly due to the failure of ORG to act in not selling the property of ORG .
CARDINAL . NORP In the course of the enforcement proceedings , it was established that on DATE ORG ( ORG суд PERSON області ) had instituted bankruptcy proceedings against the “ ORG .

CARDINAL . The applicant instituted proceedings in the Novogrodivsky City Court of GPE against GPE for failure to execute the court decision in his favour . On DATE ORG rejected the applicant ’s claim , finding no fault had been committed by that ORG . The court stated that ORG had presented a decision of ORG of GPE of DATE to the respondent company . This decision prohibited the enforcement of judgments against the company by selling its property , due to the bankruptcy proceedings which had been initiated against it .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG dismissed the applicant ’s appeal . On DATE the panel of CARDINAL judges of ORG of ORG of GPE rejected the applicant ’s request for leave to appeal .

CARDINAL . On DATE the ban on the forced sale of assets belonging to undertakings in which the ORG holds PERCENT of the share capital was entrenched in the PERSON on the Introduction of a Moratorium on the Forced Sale of Property . On DATE the Constitutional Court found the moratorium to be compatible with the provisions of the LAW .
CARDINAL . On DATE the full amount awarded to the applicant was transferred to his bank account , and on CARDINAL May CARDINAL the enforcement proceedings were completed .

CARDINAL . Under LAW ( ORG PERSON відновлення платоспроможності боржника або визнання його банкрутом ” ) , a commercial court is entitled to order a moratorium on debt recovery from a company which is the subject of bankruptcy proceedings . The moratorium implies a prohibition on ORG to execute judgments against such a company . The same LAW provides that the company protected by moratorium shall be immune from any fines and other sanctions for non - fulfilment or improper fulfilment of its financial obligations during the moratorium .

CARDINAL . The Law ( ORG Про введення мораторiю на примусову реалiзацiю TIME ” ) aims at protecting ORG interests on the sale of assets belonging to undertakings in which the ORG holds PERCENT of the share capital . A moratorium on the enforcement of judgment debts has been introduced until such time as the mechanism for the forced sale of the property of such undertakings has been improved . No time - limit has been set . LAW provides that the prohibition on the forced sale of property includes the execution of writs by ORG on property belonging to such companies . The PERSON therefore stays the execution of all writs by ORG against the assets of or undertakings in which the ORG holds PERCENT of the share capital .

CARDINAL . Under LAW , in case of delay in the fulfilment of its financial obligations , the debtor must , upon a claim by the creditor , pay the amount of the debt , plus any interest payable at an officially established inflation rate during the default period .

CARDINAL . Under LAW ( ORG PERSON виконавче провадження ” ) , the enforcement of judgments is entrusted to ORG . Under LAW , the creditor may file a complaint against actions or omissions of ORG with the head of the competent department of that ORG or with a local court . Article CARDINAL of the PERSON entitles the creditor to institute court proceedings against a legal person , entrusted with the enforcement of a judgment , for the inadequate enforcement or non - enforcement of that judgment , and to receive compensation .

CARDINAL . LAW ( ORG “ Про державну виконавчу службу ” ) provides for the liability of bailiffs for any inadequate performance of their duties , and compensation for damages caused by a bailiff when enforcing a judgment . Under LAW , acts and omissions of the bailiff can be challenged before a superior official or the courts .
CARDINAL . In its judgment , ORG of GPE mentioned in particular :

“ ORG considers that the PERSON [ on the moratorium ] does not violate the constitutional requirement about the binding nature of court judgments . Court judgments on the forced attachment of the property of enterprises , given both prior to and after the PERSON was adopted , have not been abolished by it ; they remain in force , and their enforcement is suspended until the mechanism for the forced sale of property is improved . That means that the PERSON established an extended term of enforcement during this period ....
CARDINAL . To recognise that the PERSON “ on the Introduction of a Moratorium on the Forced Sale of Property ” of CARDINAL DATE complies with LAW ( is constitutional ) . ... ”
